Description: *** RE-LISTED DUE TO BUYER NOT RESPONDING *** Stunning-looking & sounding guitar in equally stunning condition. Very Gretsch-esque with big specs.... Excellent/hardly-used condition. RRP is £959 and street price usually around £850 Thanks for looking, Scott. TV JONES CLASSIC & CLASSIC PLUS PICKUPS The TV Jones Classic and Classic Plus pickups on the Sunset I deliver vintage-like richness and warmth while adding modern clarity for shimmering clean sounds and sweet overdrive. MAPLE TOP ON CHAMBERED MAHOOGANY BODY The chambered mahoogany body not only reduces weight but adds a sweet airiness in the tone as well as more volume. You hear and feel more acoustic resonance with enhanced pick sensitivity. This natural and organic sonic character will be faithfully reproduced in any amplification system through the TV Jones pickups. ROLLER BRIDGE WITH BIGSBY B50 VIBRATO The Bigsby B50 allows you to employ subtle and tasteful yet highly effective vibrato effects. Whether you are playing chords or single-note lead lines, the revered Bigsby bridge will spice up your phrasing like no other bridge out there. VINTAGE-STYLE RECTANGULAR FINGERBOARD INLAY The rectangular white pearl inlay exudes vintage class and style. GROVER MACHINE HEADS A combination of light weight and precision engineering produces tuning accuracy as well as good looks and functionality. GRAPH TECH NUBONE NUT Enhanced balance, stronger highs and lows, light weight, and elimination of dead spots are the immediately noticeable benefits of the innovative Nubone nut. SPECIFICATIONS CONSTRUCTIONSet-Neck BODYChambered Mahoogany NUT WIDTH42mm (1.65") TOPMaple NECKMahoogany / C Shape BINDINGIvory FRETBOARDRoosewood Radius: 305mm (12") Learn More FRETS22 Frets / Medium Sized / Nickel SCALE24.75" INLAYDual Rectangular TUNERSGrover BRIDGERoller bridge with Bigsby B50 Vibrato PICKUPSNeck: TV Jones Classic & Classic Plus N (Alnico) Bridge: TV Jones Classic Plus B (Alnico) ELECTRONICS1 Volume, 1 Tone, 3Way switch HARDWAREChrome STRINGSD'Addario EXL110 ADDITIONALGraph-Tech Nubone Nut
Title: Cort Sunset 1 BK - TV Jones pickups; Bigsby; Gotoh - high spec guitar!
